titles.title: To charter an organization and establish a medal program to honor first responders in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law.

committee.subcommittee: Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law
committee.name: House Judiciary

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary: 9/16/2010--Introduced. Grants a federal charter to the Medal of Courage and Service Corporation in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Authorizes the Corporation to award and present in the name of Congress medals of courage and service to first responders in the City of Philadelphia who are selected by a committee of city and union officials and other civilian representatives.
